mapper.sql: id, video_name, video_url, video_html, video_type_id, video_del
mapper.insert:
insert into video_info
id,
video_name,
video_url,
video_html,
video_type_id,
video_del,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{videoHtml,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{videoTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{videoDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update video_info
video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_html = #{videoHtml,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_type_id = #{videoTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_del = #{videoDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video_info set video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_html = #{videoHtml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_type_id = #{videoTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_del = #{videoDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id as id,a.video_name as videoName, a.video_html as videoHtml ,a.video_url as videoUrl, a.video_del as videoDel, b.type_name as typeName from video_info as a inner join video_type as b on a.video_type_id=b.id
